text: Brad Falchuk Net Worth : Brad Falchuk is an American television writer, director, and producer who has a net worth of $ 25 million. Brad Falchuk was born in 1971 and grew up in Newton, Massachusetts. He attended the American Film Institute and graduated from Hobart and William Smith Colleges. In 2014 he was the commencement speaker for his alma matter's graduating classes. He started off writing for Mutant X, Earth : Final Conflict, and Veritas : The Quest. Falchuk served as a producer and writer for the TV series Nip / Tuck. He also co - created, wrote, and executive produced the Fox series Glee. Falchuk also co - created, wrote, and executive produced the series American Horror Story. He has won two AFI Awards for TV Program of the Year
